H0.text: Sumatran, Malayan and Siberian are all species of which mammal. Leopard

H1.text: Sumatran, Malayan and Siberian are all species of which mammal. Bear

H2.text: Sumatran, Malayan and Siberian are all species of which mammal. Wolf

H3.text: Sumatran, Malayan and Siberian are all species of which mammal. TIGER

A4.text: Nine recent tiger subspecies have been proposed, including the Malayan, Siberian, and Sumatran tigers.
